definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: hard, barren (NH id. lonely NHWB; Ar. jalmadun rock, jalmadah;un stony (of land); Aram. [[גַּלְמוּדָה]] cf. Ba:NB 208)—´[[ג]] Job 3:7 + 2 t. Jb; f. [[גַּלְמוּדָה]] Is 49:21; —hard, barren, unproductive, mostly fig.: Job 15:34 of company of wicked men, where prob. a subst. v. De Di; Job 30:3 through want and famine (they are) stiff (lifeless; RV gaunt); of exiled Zion as bereaved and barren woman Is 49:21; so of night of Job's birth Job 3:7.
